comments:
With Eclipse 3.2M5 I can no longer import team project sets. Please let me know if you need more details. I get the following error:

Command-line arguments:  -os win32 -ws win32 -arch x86 -consoleLog -clean -data S:\ws\eclipse32m5\rpet
